text: - Onica by Rackspace Technology
is a AWS Premier Consulting Partner,

and we focus really on
helping our customers
unlock their business potential,

meet their biggest
challenges through the cloud,
and specifically, AWS.

Really, ultimately, they're
trying to make the best use
of the AWS cloud possible,
and we're here to help them do so.

So we've been with AWS
Marketplace for several years,

tried traditionally selling
and reselling ISV solutions,
and more recently,

but at least for a couple years,
selling services, as well.

There's two big reasons
that our customers choose

to procure our services
on the marketplace.

The first is that it's
ease of procurement,

so they can move faster and get
their services more quickly.
And the second is a flywheel approach
where our procurement motion

and our delivery motion are
tied really closely together.

Our procurement cycle
and our delivery cycle
can sort of roll with each other.

And as our customers are
consuming the services,

consuming AWS cloud services,
getting their benefit,
we can roll the next one right around.
When those two things are in lock step,

we've seen the best possible
outcomes for our customers

and the best possible outcomes
through the AWS Marketplace.

Our collaboration with the
Marketplace Organization
has been really tight.

We couldn't have gotten to
where we are on our journey

without their support, both
from the Marketplace team,

as well as our AWS PDM
team and our sales teams.
It's definitely a whole community effort.
